website_summaries.verdict: One of the only rebound nets meant for larger sports balls found in kick sports such as soccer.
pros: Large 7-foot by 4-foot playing surface allows the kicker to vary the angle of the rebound
Included frame is easy to assemble in a short amount of time
Can be used with multiple nets for a more intense practice session
cons: Large footprint of the frame takes up a lot of yard space when fully erected

customer_reviews.title: Works excellent on grass if staked down otherwise it moves around ...
customer_reviews.text: We bought an open box with no instructions. It was a little confusing to put together but figured it out by looking at the pictures. Works excellent on grass if staked down otherwise it moves around and loses energy to return the ball. We bought some cheap sandbags and play sand at Home Depot so the girls could use it on the cement. Either way it needs to be held down to work consistently.
customer_reviews.author: EACOOK1

customer_reviews.title: Not thrilled with this,
customer_reviews.text: Not thrilled with this, bought it in November but only set it up in May and it's already broken
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Lopez-Humann

customer_reviews.title: PLEASE READ
customer_reviews.text: Absolute embarrassment. Loses resistance within a week of getting it. I've never written a review before but this needs to be said. Can't complete a mere 4 yard pass with it. The hooks come undone as soon as you play a ball against the net. Was expecting more considering this product is more than 100 dollars. Please continue searching, this is not the net for you. The mounts make no difference, even if the net is stuck in place, the ball does not make it more than 3 yards back to you, no matter how much pace you play the ball against the net with.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great rebounder
customer_reviews.text: My daughter uses this daily to practice her soccer footwork and shooting. It is very well constructed, easy to move around. We don't often even need to "stake" it to the ground. Wish I would have bought this sooner. The 2 nets are great for practicing different skills. Comes with some examples of footwork to practice, as well as having videos online. We looked at other ones in the local stores and they were not nearly as well made. Was very easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: RRH92

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic trainer
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son, age 14, for Christmas and he loves it, the bounce back is fabulous and quality is excellent. He loves the many options he can use to practice with it. We have it in our lower level since we live in Kansas and it is cold out, it's a perfect size, not too big that it overpowers the room but big enough to practice for hours.
customer_reviews.author: Seinderella

customer_reviews.title: Product works significantly better than others which promise to return the ball at ...
customer_reviews.text: The net ripped in several places after 7 uses (6 months). Product works significantly better than others which promise to return the ball at an angle (e.g. franklin pro). The plastic anchors that shipped easily broke, and age generally not suitable to hold it down. Best to weigh it down with a sandbag. My kids really liked it when it worked, unfortunately, it didn't work more than several times.
customer_reviews.author: Piotr T Prussak

customer_reviews.title: Replace the rings that attach keep the pins secure. You'll regret it if you dont
customer_reviews.text: I had an integral part go missing because the ring it was attached to was extremely poor quality. I assume it got snagged as I was putting it away and broke this losing one of the pins. I called Skilz directly and they said they dont sell replacement parts. Disappointed in not being able to replace an integral part of the product myself. Need to go somewhere and have a piece custom made to match the pin hole. I feel like they should have replacement parts for everything.
customer_reviews.author: nick eldridge

customer_reviews.title: Quality is an issue. If the stitching stayed together it would be perfect!
customer_reviews.text: My 12 year old has loved this trainer. His soccer coach was using it in training sessions. We bought with the goal of improving first touch. It has helped. However, I purchased on Dec 28th, as of today Feb 14th it’s stiching has come undone. Making one side unusable. I would have hoped that this would have held together longer than a month and a half. My return time ended 2 weeks ago.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Spears

customer_reviews.title: Great practice net for passing, kicking, etc.
customer_reviews.text: My ten year old son loves this practice/rebound net. Truly so so easy to assemble. Impressed with how it was shipped, most assembled already. Seems quite portable as well so will be able to take along to my sons' many practice sessions once the teams reassemble (post virus life....). This rebounder net is quite sturdy and reflexive to my son's shots. It provides the teammate he does not have now to 'kick' the ball back to him. This is a godsend frankly for my son to continue to improve upon his basic soccer skills. Highly recommend this product. Son very glad to have it and use it.
customer_reviews.author: William M. Patterson

customer_reviews.title: My kid loves this thing
customer_reviews.text: The only thing is that it was hard at first for my 9 year old to take this in and out of the garage. It takes up a good chunk of real estate in the garage as well. (We use it in the front- so it's not out all the time.) Other than than it works well. During COVID restrictions her and a neighbor are able to use opposite sides of it, while being pretty far apart.
customer_reviews.author: eugene b.

customer_reviews.title: Find the space and Use the pegs
customer_reviews.text: Our 3 year old and 6 year old grandsons love this soccer net. I also sent it to my nephews in Idaho! It is well made, durable and very portable. Has it's own carry bag. Helps the 3 year old understand the concept of placing the ball and our 6 year old of the velocity and height of his kicks.
customer_reviews.author: mashenn

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and portable!
customer_reviews.text: This is very sturdy and the perfect size to take anywhere. It’s easy to put together and very simple to take apart. The frame is actually all connected with an internal cable so it folds up in the bag and is a breeze to put back together. My son loves it and is very pleased with the way it works! It’s well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Dunfee1452

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I bought this to pass the time during quarantine and to try and stop from getting too fat. Bounces the ball back as advertised. Steaks keep it firmly in place. I'm a largish human and the net took some pretty hard passes no problem. Only problem is I wore bald spots in the yard from over use.
customer_reviews.author: pencek

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy, lower net keeps coming off
customer_reviews.text: The lower rebounder keeps unsnapping from the lower bar rendering it useless. Very disappointing. Will try to return it but may not be able to as I bought it well in advance for Xmas and just set it up 2 weeks ago.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Great rebounder!
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect for practice and drills. It’s a little light and can move, but with a couple of sand bags that issue is fixed. The nets are strong and have endured a lots of touches without any signs of wear yet.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Ahrens

customer_reviews.title: I coach HS soccer and this is a great thing to have in practice when working on specific ...
customer_reviews.text: I coach HS soccer and this is a great thing to have in practice when working on specific skills. It often times frees up a coach from having to make wall passes in a drill.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!!
customer_reviews.text: Don't think twice just buy it. Only thing you will need is weights or something to hold it in place. Really helped the kids touch and trained them how to juggle property. Using it daily under Quarantine.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Stipkovich

customer_reviews.title: Great tool
customer_reviews.text: A little tricky to assemble and directions are not too clear. Watch the video...if it is not returning the ball as shown in the video, you probably don't have it put together correctly! My soccer loving kiddos love this tool! Makes playing soccer by yourself fun. Really improves foot work!
customer_reviews.author: Dan B.

customer_reviews.title: Small / Passing Net - No Good
customer_reviews.text: The big net works well for the most part but the ball takes weird bounces if it isn't hit in the middle. The small net doesn't hold up at all, which is why I decided to return. Overall, it's well-made if you are only using the big net.
customer_reviews.author: Dillon

customer_reviews.title: Great training aid
customer_reviews.text: Great little training aid for a developing soccer player. Not too hard to assemble. Kinda bulky and hard to store in my garage without disassembling it. If I could hang it from the ceiling, might be good. Light, fairly easy to handle.
customer_reviews.author: Chad D Will

customer_reviews.title: Local soccer shop suggested.
customer_reviews.text: It’s easy to assemble for me but my 10yr old had more difficulty with it. Therefore he doesn’t bother with taking it places. I’m confident it’s easily portable. It has great rebound action.
customer_reviews.author: UthGuy

customer_reviews.title: It just won't work
customer_reviews.text: The ball bounces more muffled than rebounded. My son got so frustrated that I took it down. I use other SKLZ products and associate them with excellence. But not this one, totally disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: David P. De Almeida

customer_reviews.title: Product damaged/malfunctioned
customer_reviews.text: One of the poles did not measure/fit correctly together. Cannot assemble properly.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsey8822

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality, does not last
customer_reviews.text: My son used this product sporadically for two months. Then he just stopped using it. When I asked him why, he explained that it didn't work anymore. On closer inspection, I found the netting had broken apart in multiple places, rendering this product useless as a rebounder. I expected better quality at this price. I would not recommend this product to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Safe Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Well built
customer_reviews.text: Great for little drills and pre game warm up at home. Works well as a mini goal. It’s really well constructed and lasted all summer outside one the elements.
customer_reviews.author: Sean G

customer_reviews.title: Ingenious but not durable
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the rebounder a month or so ago. It's well-designed, it offers both a bouncer and a "wall", which allows a wide variety of drills, useful to keep it moving during the lockdown. Unfortunately, there are already some wear signs that I would expect for a 100+ USD equipment. There are multiple rust spots and the low bounce side is losing up, losing its elasticity, and rebound power. I attached some pictures to show them.
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo Miranda

customer_reviews.title: Teenage soccer player LOVES it!
customer_reviews.text: Our son plays high school/club soccer and he loves this thing. Provides and easy way to work on touches in our backyard without chasing a ball and simulates real returns. (According to the soccer player)
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. C

customer_reviews.title: Teen Tested Tough.
customer_reviews.text: My teenage son loves this. Good quality to withstand his hard kicks. Good bounce back action. We bought the same model, but the corner straps started to tear, so for this one we just put some electrical tape on the strap ahead of time, and all is well.
customer_reviews.author: hondo

customer_reviews.title: Awesome rebounder!
customer_reviews.text: This is such a great option for training. It is extremely easy to set up and take apart. It rebounds really good and both sides are good for different types of drills.
customer_reviews.author: John Smythe

customer_reviews.title: Netting won't hold up.
customer_reviews.text: It's an incredibly clever product. As a coach, I love the portability and easy setup and the fact it comes in a carry bag. Yet, on the very first kick, the ball hit one of the straps and broke it. Another 15 minutes later, a mis-kick broke part of the netting. Maybe it's only designed for small kids. The force of the ball was not exceptional when it gave.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Got this in this week and was easy to setup
customer_reviews.text: Got this in this week and was easy to setup. Unfortunately one of the yellow poles was missing the attachment pin to clip onto the other pole. I dislike the carrying bag as it's too small length wise for the long black poles to fit in perfectly. The stitching began to tear as i was trying to put them in.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 11 year old daughter. Easy to setup and great for improving soccer skills. Now I just have to get her to use it without me telling her.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Silva

customer_reviews.title: WOW is all I can say!
customer_reviews.text: This product is 10x better that I ever thought it would be! A must buy for every committed and training soccer player.
customer_reviews.author: rjs

customer_reviews.title: very good - excellent for passing and power shots
customer_reviews.text: very good - excellent for passing and power shots. Strap stitching is poor though - one came of while setting up. Needs reinforced stitching for the straps.
customer_reviews.author: Leon Higgins

customer_reviews.title: Worth it if your child plays soccer
customer_reviews.text: Boys love this thing....they use it all the time in the backyard. Worth the money for a birthday or Christmas gift....
customer_reviews.author: KHsuperwomanTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Best Soccer Trainer
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 10 year old. Pure awesomeness! Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than I thought.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my soccer loving son. He likes it. Very sturdy. Just a warning that it is big!!
customer_reviews.author: shoplove

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Well... so far it is holding up fine after a couple weeks in the yard. You don’t get a great rebound unless you put a lot of power into your kick. The ball can squeeze under the short side. Easy enough to set up
customer_reviews.author: ride

customer_reviews.title: This is awesome but takes a while and is difficult to set ...
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome but takes a while and is difficult to set up, especially alone. I bought my own after using a coach's a couple times and the first time out on the field the metal frame broke after tapping a ball against it. Disappointing, but I think it may have been defective. Would like to have another one sent to me, but can't seem to find the SKLZ contact through Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Lutz

customer_reviews.title: Excellent training tool!
customer_reviews.text: This item is a must for training. Great quality and you can assemble it in 2 minutes. Great add! And highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: J. Mata

customer_reviews.title: Overall a useful training tool
customer_reviews.text: Overall a useful training tool, especially if you already have some mastery of ball control. There are a couple of issues I did not care for: Neither side of the net rebounds the ball very strongly; the lower side of the net snaps out of place every so often, especially if you kick the ball hard into it. I had to do some mickey-mouse fixing of my own.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Jorge J. Asturias, PsyD, Inc.

customer_reviews.title: Works well but if used on turf buy 2 sandbags
customer_reviews.text: Works well. If you are on turf make sure to use a couple of sandbags. Once we added those the sandbags the rebounder would not move. Prior it moved with every kick.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great trainer
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this. Instant results for him. Easily put together in less than 5 minutes. Stake are easy for my son to place and remove when bad weather comes
customer_reviews.author: wesland sinor

customer_reviews.title: Just As Described
customer_reviews.text: So far so awesome! We love it and I can’t wait to see if it helps my soccer players with their skills. I also love using it.
customer_reviews.author: Camren N.

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last 1 month.
customer_reviews.text: My 2 kids LOVED this trainer. However, it only lasted about a month until it started falling apart and ripping. This was a Christmas gift for my kids and we waited to set it up until the middle of April to avoid snow storms. Unfortunately, the return window passed in January (when it was still boxed up.) Disappointed for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa H.

customer_reviews.title: Great investment
customer_reviews.text: Easy to setup and works great for quick work out during this COVID-19 time. Recommend you have low cut grass or artificial to get the ball to bounce back.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Mercurio

customer_reviews.title: Grand daughter loves it.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our Grand daughter and she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: caharris

customer_reviews.title: Straps ripped after a few months
customer_reviews.text: The product is decent, but not durable at all. Bought it for son who practices a lot, but the net strap that holds the large net to the bars has broken and the rebounder is useless now. Decent while it lasted a few months but this is not something that will last long. Very disappointed in the $127 purchase.
customer_reviews.author: UCSB_PHD

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Nice rebounder. My players love it. It seems to be very durable. Easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Harold Palmera Acosta

customer_reviews.title: DON'T BUY!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product at the end of June this year and by the beginning of August all the tension was gone and it was broken in 3 places. My daughter loved this product until it stopped working within 2 months. Keep in mind that my daughter was gentle with her rebounder. This is a very low quality product and quite frankly a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy for a busy Mom!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, move, carry. Sturdy carrying bag, multi-functional skills tool. Also doubles as a baseball catcher/bounceback!
customer_reviews.author: BzzzEmum

customer_reviews.title: The lower rebounder does not work
customer_reviews.text: It looks nice, and the idea is good, but the lower rebounder does not work well. It constantly fall off after a few passes (even for u10 girls). We used it for a few weeks and then end up giving it up due to the mess.
customer_reviews.author: Algorithmic

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son to improve ball handling skills. He loves it!
customer_reviews.author: nb3006

customer_reviews.title: Great for my 8 year old daughter to practice
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty easy to setup and take down. Seems durable, but we've only had it for a few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: dieseldavid

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for my grandson for his birthday he really enjoys it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my grandson for his birthday he really enjoys it
customer_reviews.author: Brad Warren

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my 10 year old. Works great, just not convenient to set up and break down so they don’t play with it much.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Fun and durable
customer_reviews.text: This is a great training tool. We have a 13 girl and a 7 year old boy. They use it every day. The great thing is they can both use it at the same time training on something different. Very easy to us and out together. Holds up well in the Texa weather.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Warren

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and great for practicing
customer_reviews.text: This product is great for anyone that needs to practice soccer! Ours is in the basement and my son will go practice for long periods of time!
customer_reviews.author: Brian R. Bostater

customer_reviews.title: Works!!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together and really works!! My 3 kids love it.
customer_reviews.author: D's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son, age 8, for gift and he loves it, the bounce back is fabulous and quality is excellent. He loves the many options he can use to practice with it. it's a perfect size, not too big that it overpowers the room but big enough to practice for hours.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great re-bounder!
customer_reviews.text: Great trainer to work on first-touch and passing. My son loves working with it indoors and outdoors. highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: A. Niv

customer_reviews.title: What a fantastic product! My son is on a club team
customer_reviews.text: What a fantastic product! My son is on a club team, but when there isn't a practice, he likes to go up to the fields to practice on his own. This makes it so much easier for him! It has really helped with his volley and is just plain fun for him. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Mark Nicholaw

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: We put it in the backyard close to the windows. The net controls direction well and I have no fear of any window being broken.
customer_reviews.author: Ada Yonofski

customer_reviews.title: Returned
customer_reviews.text: Returned item wen I found out my grandson already had one and was he was beyond the skill level of this item at 8 yrs. old .
customer_reviews.author: Linda C. Foster

customer_reviews.title: Broke within a week
customer_reviews.text: It broke within a week. The low rebound clips/straps busted. Returned and had a new one sent only to have the exact same thing happen. Because the original purchase date was outside of the return window I can't return it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works exactly as advertised
customer_reviews.text: My daughter used these at college so we got one for training. It is easy to assemble and has been used about 8 hour in the last two days.
customer_reviews.author: Duck

customer_reviews.title: good quality, competitive price.
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it. It is a great product. quick easy assembly, and storage.
customer_reviews.author: Kazimierz C.

customer_reviews.title: Ground stakes are faulty
customer_reviews.text: Net works great. Unfortunately you get 4 stakes to put into the ground. Two of them already broke and the other two are splitting. They need better stakes for the price. I use it for my 8,5, & 3 year old so it’s not like it’s getting a beating.
customer_reviews.author: Norma

customer_reviews.title: My boys love it!
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with this rebounder, Sturdy material, well made. My boys have been practicing with this a couple times a day. Great product to get them outside and to practice their soccer skills.
customer_reviews.author: yndibecerra

customer_reviews.title: but this thing is GREAT! Having both sides to train on is fantastic
customer_reviews.text: We were replacing an older, cheaper net. Seemed expensive, but this thing is GREAT! Having both sides to train on is fantastic. It has really improved my boys foot skills.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Boe

customer_reviews.title: Great training tool
customer_reviews.text: Easy to setup. Great training tool for foot work and seeing up volleys. I recommend for anyone that wants to up their game
customer_reviews.author: E. Rosario

customer_reviews.title: Great for two sided soccer skills practice
customer_reviews.text: Great for two sided soccer skills practice. Gets all players involved without the need for a passer. Bought some photography sand bags to put on it as strong kicks will move it around if not weighted down. Included anchors are nice, but would never get them back out of the ground where we practice.
customer_reviews.author: B Higginbotham

customer_reviews.title: great!
customer_reviews.text: bought for son. He loves it! great quality and easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: jf

customer_reviews.title: I'd like the webbing to be a little tighter so the ...
customer_reviews.text: I'd like the webbing to be a little tighter so the ball would bounce back with a little more life. But, all in all, it's a decent product.
customer_reviews.author: Cliff Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Even good for older players
customer_reviews.text: Ought this for my 15yr old son who plays soccer at a high level....he loves it. He loves being able to play alone and improve his skills.....so far sooo good!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Boemer

customer_reviews.title: Son plays with it all the time and it's held ...
customer_reviews.text: Son plays with it all the time and it's held up to the rigors of constant play with him and his friends.
customer_reviews.author: jb

customer_reviews.title: Great for training
customer_reviews.text: Great for training. My daughter even uses it is our garage for winter training when it is too coold and snowy. easy to move as well.
customer_reviews.author: Patty Cochran

customer_reviews.title: Great for helping kids keep and develop soccer skills
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to put together. We bought this for our kids due to the coronavirus with no soccer practice. We wanted the kids to have opportunity to keep their skills and get some exercise too.
customer_reviews.author: Planet

customer_reviews.title: This is a great kick back
customer_reviews.text: This is a great kick back. I am a coach with 2 kids that play soccer and this is great for training.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT!!
customer_reviews.text: BEST QUALITY PRODUCT. LOVE IT. KID IS REALLY HAPPY WITH REBOUNDER.
customer_reviews.author: vladimir

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Setup and great for kids
customer_reviews.text: My 13 year old son and 7 year old daughter use it all the time, it's easy to setup and take down, if interested look at grit soccer training on YT for additional training drills.
customer_reviews.author: rafael gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: The idea behind the product is fantastic. I hope it lasts
customer_reviews.text: One of the poles was missing a hook and the lower net ripped on one of the sides. Lets see how the replacement holds. The idea behind the product is fantastic. I hope it lasts.
customer_reviews.author: JM5

customer_reviews.title: broken bar after a couple months
customer_reviews.text: We bought the trainer in June for our 10-year-old daughter. After 3 months of limited use, a major part broke. Hopefully, they will replace it for free.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together, does what it's supposed to. This is a great practicing tool for my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Ksmum

customer_reviews.title: Great for not having a wall.
customer_reviews.text: Maybe a little small for my 13 year old.He does use it and works good.Great if you don’t have a wall near by.
customer_reviews.author: phillip

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality. Does exactly what it's supposed to do
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality. Does exactly what it's supposed to do. Also, easy to set up. Takes approx 5 mins to set up and 4 mins to break down. The stakes are an absolute requirement (I coach 16-17yr old girls, and they kick pretty hard). The stakes are heavy duty plastic, but I'm concerned that one or two will crack soon. So, I might order extra so I'm covered.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well made net
customer_reviews.text: Strurdy, well made, easy to assemble. We use this to practice drills and skills with our 8 and 10 year old boys and it's very good quality
customer_reviews.author: Mommyof4

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect and as expected. Present for my 8 year old son to practice his ball touches.
customer_reviews.author: Izzy's mom

customer_reviews.title: Works great - being used a ton.
customer_reviews.text: My daughters have loved it and used it a ton. Seems to be holding up really well.
customer_reviews.author: John J. Weaks

customer_reviews.title: They love it.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second trainer I have purchased for Grandsons. They love it.
customer_reviews.author: Suzi in Texas

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: After one use the strap ripped off from the net.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for passing and shooting drills.
customer_reviews.text: It is an amazing product great for when you are practicing alone it is very easy to build and it is not a bother to carry around.
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro Burguete

customer_reviews.title: It would have been great for my son but one of the tabs that ...
customer_reviews.text: It would have been great for my son but one of the tabs that snaps on to the support poles broke. So the lower net is not being used.
customer_reviews.author: R A

customer_reviews.title: Works okay, 1 year and parts starting to break!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this rebounder about a year ago. Works okay, never worked great or like it appears to in the videos. The short passing side is very weak and most of the time my son just goes to the basement to kick against the wall instead of using this equipment. The taller curved rebounder works a little better but typically only produces a rainbow type ball a foot or two from the net. However, given the distance and power needed to produce even this kind of rebound the kicker must then run up several feet to retrieve the ball before it hits the ground. Good idea, but just doesn't work like they show in the videos.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron D.

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to backyard soccer goal
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Easy to assemble. Strong construction. Able to withstand outdoor elements. works as advertised. Son uses all the one to work on touches
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Getting missing piece

customer_reviews.text: It’s exactly what I wanted for soccer training as well as quick shipping as I live in Australia

customer_reviews.title: Looks good but will not last for inspiring young soccer players.
customer_reviews.text: I have a 7 and 11 year old boys that uses it about 3 times a week for about 6 mth. it has broke at the plastic and will not stand on its own. Looks good but not durable for and inspiring soccer player. Wouldn't tell friends to buy.
customer_reviews.author: mike lopez

customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect product. It is big and very easy to use i like how there is a passing side and a shooting side also it is very not delicate also i love the fact that is very easy to assemble

customer_reviews.title: Great training tool
customer_reviews.text: Great training tool, easy to put together and move. Only thing that would improve it would be stakes to hold it in place.
customer_reviews.author: Terri M

product_meta.title: SKLZ Quickster Soccer Trainer Portable Soccer Rebounder Net for Volley, Passing, and Solo Training
product_meta.description: Use the Quickster Soccer Trainer as your Portable Soccer Rebounder Net to take your practice to the next level. Improve ball control, settling, rebounds, and aim with this essential tool. It works well as a soccer volley trainer, soccer passing trainer, and general soccer skills trainer. Using the Quickster Soccer Trainers patented design and true roll technology, mimic the action you’ll feel in the game. Get the amount of reps needed to hone your skills with first and second touches and master passing and receiving on the ground. When you use this multi touch skill rebounder, you will practice trapping the ball with your feet, thighs, and chest as you control the soccer ball from the air. Alternately, you can work volleys and half volleys with instep and laces, the choice is yours. The lightweight, yet durable frame is easy to transport in it’s carry case, and the four ground stakes helps secure it, so it can take the most powerful kicks. Use the SLLZ Quickster Soccer Trainer to develop your ball control and master the skills your want.
feature_bullets: Provides a true-roll that helps master passing and receiving on ground
Maximize reps by trapping the ball out of the air with your feet, thighs and chest
Work on volleys and half volleys with instep and laces
Shoots ball into the air for downward offensive headers and defensive headers up and away

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
